855810.name: Fantasy Grounds - By Flame, Storm, and Thorn (5E)
855810.description:
By Flame, Storm, and Thorn

What Stirs in the Darkened Wood?
With BY FLAME, STORM, AND THORN you can give rangers new archetype options in 5th edition, emphasizing new approaches to combat, or find inspiration for dangerous new adversaries in the wilds.
The Lantern-bearer, the Stormcloak, and the Thornguard are ranger archetypes with unique approaches to magic and guardianship. They fit easily into most settings and work well for ranged or melee combatants.
Product Information
This product provides your players with additional ranger archetype options.
This product includes:
  • The Lantern-bearer offers hope in the darkness or fiery vengeance.
  • The Stormcloak strikes with the power of lightning and thunder.
  • The Thornguard deploys devious devices in combat to afflict foes.
Converted by:Charles Surette
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Charles Surette
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
